about_the_game:
Starter Card Audio is an asset pack containing 50+ unique Sound Effects to suit a variety of games. Each Sound Effect is made with many naturally occurring gameplay moments in mind in a card game that need audio feedback. They are short, thematic and easy to customize in your preferred audio editing software.

If you are using Card Game Combat plugin these assets will be a perfect fit!

■ 5 themed Sets of 11 Sound Effects (55 total) that can be used in a variety of ways in game projects, such as audio feedback or creating an ambience.

 

■ High-quality sound effects available in M4A, OGG and WAV formats.

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 【Themes (5)】

 

・Board Game

・Fantasy - Western

・Fantasy - Eastern

・Sci-Fi - Space

・Sci-Fi - Virtual

 

【Effect Type (11)】

 

・Starting your Turn

・Ending your Turn

・Drawing a Card

・Discard a Card

・Exiling a Card

・Creating a Card

・Destroying a Card

・Moving a Card

・Shuffling a Deck

・Rolling 1 Die

・Rolling 2 Dice

 

-----------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Each Sound Effect is made with many naturally occurring gameplay moments in mind in a card game that need audio feedback. They are short, thematic and easy to customize in your preferred audio editing software.

If you are using Card Game Combat plugin these assets will be a perfect fit!

■ 5 themed Sets of 11 Sound Effects (55 total) that can be used in a variety of ways in game projects, such as audio feedback or creating an ambience.

 

■ High-quality sound effects available in M4A, OGG and WAV formats.
